name: Decreaser
description:
Made for the Clicker Game Jam 2023

Developed days: 2nd Apr to 6th Apr.

Click earthquakes to make people feel less scared! Don't let them hit cities though, people will find out and give less money!

Credits:
Most of it: Me (SeeYouSacri)

Map:  https://azgaar.github.io/Fantasy-Map-Generator/
